sentences:
Chapman Square is the debut studio album released by four piece British band Lawson .
The album was released on 19 October 2012 via Polydor Records .
The album includes their three top ten singles " When She Was Mine " , " Taking Over Me " and " Standing in the Dark " .
The album was mainly produced by John Shanks with Duck Blackwell , Paddy Dalton , Ki Fitzgerald , Carl Falk , and Rami Yacoub .
The album was re - released in the autumn of 2013 as Chapman Square Chapter II , with the lead single from the re - release being " Brokenhearted " , which features American rapper B.o .
B.
As of July 2016 , the album has sold 169,812 copies .
